Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class SpecialCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.SpecialCharacter
public class SpecialCharacter extends Object
The character card on the client side.
Author:
Riccardo Milici, Matteo Negro

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialCharacter

      public SpecialCharacter(int id, boolean active, boolean alreadyPaid, boolean paidInTurn, com.google.gson.JsonObject students, Integer availableBans, int cost, int usesNumber)
      Class constructor. It creates an instance of the class containing the given specific effect object and identified by the given numeric id.
      Parameters:
      id - The identification number of the special character card.
      active - True if the special character's effect is active.
      alreadyPaid - True if the special character has already been paid, and it's effect has already been activated during this game.
      paidInTurn - Tells whether the current card has already been played in the current turn.
      students - A map with the students to put on the card (null, otherwise).
      availableBans - Number of ban marker available.
      cost - Price to activate the effect.
      usesNumber - The number of players in the game.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(HouseColor student)
      Adds a student, of the color specified by the parameter, to the map saved in the students attribute, increasing the counter mapped with the respective HouseColor.
      Parameters:
      student - The color of the students to increase.

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent(HouseColor student) throws IllegalMoveException
      Deletes a student, of the color specified by the parameter, from the map saved in the students attribute, decreasing the counter mapped with the respective HouseColor.
      Parameters:
      student - The color of the students to decrease.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown when there are no students of the specified color on the card.

    • addBan

      public void addBan()
      Increases the number of the available bans.

    • removeBan

      public void removeBan() throws IllegalMoveException
      Decreases the number of the available bans.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown when there are no ban marker on the card.

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Returns the activation cost of the effect.
      Returns:
      cost attribute
